author: Austen Hufford
title: Sports-Betting Companies Race to Expand After Supreme Court Decision - WSJ
text:
Companies on both sides of the Atlantic are working to launch or expand U.S. sports-betting operations after the Supreme Court struck down federal restrictions that kept a damper on the business.
Paddy Power Betfair PLC, the Dublin, Ireland, sports betting and gambling company, said it is in talks to merge its U.S. business with FanDuel Inc., a daily fantasy-sports company. FanDuel, based in New York City, declined to comment on the matter.
